getTokenStream

public ITokenStream getTokenStream()
                            throws TokenizerException
Returns the token stream of a file

The token stream needs a configuration for it's information, which will be set with the setConfiguration()-command. Because the configuration contains a filelist, the Token of a file will be put out only in one stream. It will be devided only with a special EOFToken to indicate the end of a file.

Returns:
der Tokenstrom.
Throws:
TokenizerException - - explains what went wrong
See Also:
EOFToken
